original_text: in a normal screen process , these bromides would be barely enough to sustain an interstitial program on the discovery channel . but in imax 3-d , the clichés disappear into the vertiginous perspectives opened up by the photography .
generated_text:
1. "The mind-numbing predictability of this sci-fi thriller would be tolerable in a standard cinematic experience, but in IMAX 3D, the visuals transport you to a world beyond the mundane."
2. "In a typical summer blockbuster, the formulaic plot would be a turn-off, but in IMAX 3D, the stunning visuals make it a thrilling ride."
3. "The familiar tropes of this action movie would be forgettable in a standard screening, but in IMAX 3D, the immersive experience elevates it to new heights."
4. "The overused themes of this drama would be dull in a standard format, but in IMAX 3D, the breathtaking cinematography makes it a cinematic masterpiece."
